page.title: 07RECREATION IN TYNEMOUTH
page.content: Tynemouth offers a wide range of recreational facilities to its residents and to visitors. There are a number of beaches, the biggest of which is Long Sands - a wide expanse of sand which is very popular. There is not great deal of entertainment for visitors but there is a small theatre, the Priory Theatre, which is always well-supported. Various sports are catered for in the two public parks - Northumberland Park and Tynemouth Park - Tennis and bowls being popular in the summer. Golf can be played at Tynemouth Golf Club. For siling enthusiasts there are sailing events staged by Tynemouth Sailing Club at the Haven.
